# strides

**Instance Property**

An array of strides, in elements, one for each dimension of this tensor.

## Declaration

```swift
var strides: MTLTensorExtents? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property only applies if this tensor shares its storage with a buffer, otherwise it’s nil.
title: strides
